About Me

A brief look into my professional background...

BIO

I received a BS Degree in Management from Loyola University Chicago and have 7+ years of Sales & Revenue Management experience in the Hospitality Industry.

Over the last few years, under the guidance of incredible mentors and hospitality leaders, I have grown both professionally and personally in ways I could not have imagined. It was this confidence and success I achieved during this time that has allowed me the opportunity to leave my comfort zone and pursue a recently discovered dream that I feel very passionately about - Web Development.

In December of 2018, I graduated Ironhackâ€™s full-time Web Development bootcamp in Miami, FL. I am excited to combine my love for math and problem-solving with creative and innovative thinking. I look forward to being a part of this ever-evolving industry and hope to contribute toward its continuous growth.

Faena Hotel Group | Jul 2016 - Oct 2018

Director of Revenue Management

Selected Contribution: Implemented new Revenue Management System, Booking Engine, and Channel Manager expected to produce 25% increase in direct bookings and 5% increase in revenue

Revenue Manager

Selected Contribution: Recognized as Inn Key Awards Revenue Manager of the Year, Miami, FL 2017.

MDM Hotel Group | Jan 2014 - Jul 2016

Revenue Manager

Selected Contribution: Held responsibility for maximizing rooms and catering profit for five Marriott properties.

Group Sales Manager

Selected Contribution: Met revenue goals for rooms and catering during all quarters employed.
